name.baseName: Brick production ; permeable brick ; Cutting process
砖生产 ; 透水砖 ; 切割工艺

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The permeable brick utilizing the cutting process from this data set is intended for applications in constructing pavements with considerations for water permeability and drainage. These bricks are suitable for creating eco-friendly, durable surfaces in urban landscapes, such as walkways, patios, and public squares.
该数据集中使用切割工艺的透水砖旨在应用于考虑水渗透和排水的铺路施工中。这些砖块适用于在城市景观中创建环保、耐用的表面，如人行道、庭院和公共广场。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: The functional unit is the area of 1 m2 brick products.

technology.technologicalApplicability: The permeable brick utilizing the cutting process from this data set is intended for applications in constructing pavements with considerations for water permeability and drainage. These bricks are suitable for creating eco-friendly, durable surfaces in urban landscapes, such as walkways, patios, and public squares.
该数据集中使用切割工艺的透水砖旨在应用于考虑水渗透和排水的铺路施工中。这些砖块适用于在城市景观中创建环保、耐用的表面，如人行道、庭院和公共广场。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: ReCiPe midpoint (H) model is applied in this study.
本研究采用了 ReCiPe midpoint（H）模型。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: 本研究从济南顺德水泥制品有限公司收集了混凝土路面砖和透水砖的生产能耗以及各种原材料、能源投入和废气排放的相关数据。济南顺德水泥制品有限公司 山东省。

In this study, the production energy consumption of concrete pavement brick and permeable brick as well as the relevant data of all kinds of raw materials and energy input and exhaust emissions are collected from Jinan Shunde Cement Products Co. Ltd. Shandong Province.

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Yuan, X. et al. Environmental and economic impacts assessment of concrete pavement brick and permeable brick production process - A case study in China. Journal of Cleaner Production 171, 198–208 (2018).

Yuan, X. et al. Environmental and economic impacts assessment of concrete pavement brick and permeable brick production process - A case study in China. Journal of Cleaner Production 171, 198–208 (2018).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.samplingProcedure: Most data of raw materials, energy input and waste discharge were collected from the site investigation of manufacturer. Water reducer is also called water reducing agent, whose chemical constituents is the sodium salt of the sulfonate formaldehyde condensation
原材料、能源投入和废物排放的大部分数据都是从生产厂家的现场调查中收集的。减水剂，其化学成分是磺酸钠盐的甲醛缩合物
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Users of this data set should consider the specific conditions of the production environment in Jinan Shunde Cement Products Co. Ltd. when applying this data to other contexts. It is essential to adjust the data for different production scales, geographical locations, and technological variances. The functional unit of 1 m2 for brick products serves as the reference point for scaling. The data includes energy consumption, raw material use, and exhaust emissions, which should be used thoughtfully in the context of environmental performance. Sensitivity analysis based on 5% variation in key process inputs and outputs should be considered in the assessment.
使用该数据集的用户在将这些数据应用于其他环境时，应考虑济南顺德水泥制品有限公司生产环境的具体条件。在不同生产规模、地理位置和技术变化的情况下，必须调整数据。用作标定标准的功能单位是1平方米砖制品。数据包括能耗、原料使用和废气排放，应在环境性能的背景下谨慎使用。在评估中应考虑基于关键工艺输入和输出变化5%的敏感性分析。

completeness.common:other: In this research, the sensitivity analysis was carried out according to the principle of 5% variation for input and output in the change of key processes.
在本研究中，根据关键工序变化中输入和输出变化 5%的原则进行了敏感性分析。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
